caseTitle: Zahid Sarfaraz Gill v. The State thr. A.G., Islamabad
tagline: When search and seizure of narcotics is made, video recording be made and/or photographs taken as this is a lawful method to collect evidence, as permitted under Article 164 of the Qanun-e-Shahadat, 1984. This would also save ANF/Police from being accused of foisting narcotics on the accused and lend credibility to the prosecution case.
